# replies

**Instance Property**

The replies from recipients of the exchange request.

## Declaration

```swift
var replies: [GKTurnBasedExchangeReply]? { get }
```

## Replying to Exchange Requests

- **reply(withLocalizableMessageKey:arguments:data:completionHandler:)**: Replies to an exchange request on behalf of a recipient.
- **status**: The status of the exchange request.
- **GKTurnBasedExchangeStatus**: The status of an exchange or reply.
- **completionDate**: The date when all recipients of the exchange request reply.
